result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heath C Climer

10:31 AM cases 22CF527, 22CF99, 22CF609 called. Prosecuting Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Heath C Climer not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Heath C Climer. Attorney Field is unsure why the Defendant is not in court. Court notes multiple missed appearance previously. 
Warrants ordered.

10:03am Cases called: 22CF99, 22CF527 & 22CF609. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Heath C Climer not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Heath C Climer. 

Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 07/11/22 at 1:30pm.
Hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(9:52 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Heath C Climer does not appear in court or via Zoom. Attorney David W. Field in court for Heath C Climer. 
Attorney Field advises the defendant is in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Field advises the defendant may be appearing later this morning at 11 am for a new complaint. 
Attorney Field requests new dates for this case.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on June 6, 2022 at 1:15 pm.
Hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.

(Cases called at 11:11 am.)  Court Commissioner Matthew Krische appeared for Branch 3
Defendant Heath Climer appeared in custody from LaCrosse County Jail by video with Attorney Sonia Anderson for Attorney Dave Field by video from Eau Claire Jail.   State by DDA Angela Beranek.  Warrant Executed.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  Pretrial Conference:  04-20-22 at 2 pm.  Hearing:  05-11-2022 at 9:30 am.

Conditions:
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Return on warrant on March 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:02 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Heath C Climer not in court and does not appear via Zoom.
